# timingFunction

**Instance Property**

A timing function that controls the progress of the animation.

## Declaration

```swift
var timingFunction: AnimationTimingFunction
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationTimingFunction/default]. This produces an ease transition.
title: timingFunction
